item.description: Tomorrow I turn 30. I turn 30 knowing that I have an eating disorder. I have spent the last two birthdays in inpatient care for it. I will not mention numbers but I was sick. I may have not looked like I was sick at various points over the last â€¦

item.description:
Introduction

PEP 572. Love it or hate it (you should love it), it is now merged into python and will be released in python 3.8. I had an initial negative reaction to this PEP, however I’ve come around! When this PEP was proposed, I was not coding in â€¦
